title: The Big bang
description: I was born in El-Saad Alexandria Hospital —I know it's wired (Saad), and I've taken my first brith in this universe

title: First Day at School
description: I went to Abdelsalam El-Mahgoub Language School , where I tried to make my very first friends.

title: Second First Day at School
description: I then moved to Mohamed Fawzy El-Hofi Language School, the school I spent most of my life there.

title: Last First Day at School
description: I finally moved into STEM High School for Boys - 6th of October — Ranked as the best High School for Boys in Egypt.
